articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says Cole Palmer was asking to leave the club for two years before he eventually joined Chelsea.
articles.title: Palmer wanted to leave Man City 'for two years'

articles.description: Lando Norris beats Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso to take pole position for the sprint race at the Chinese Grand Prix in a hectic wet session.
articles.title: Chinese Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris on sprint pole ahead of Lewis Hamilton

articles.description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland is a doubt for his side's FA Cup semi-final against Chelsea on Saturday.
articles.title: Man City's Haaland a doubt for FA Cup semi-final

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu falls to world number one and defending champion Iga Swiatek in the quarter-finals of the Stuttgart Open.
articles.title: Stuttgart Open: Emma Raducanu falls to top seed Iga Swiatek in quarter-finals

articles.description: Premier League clubs' spending on agents is criticised by Fifa president Gianni Infantino, who says more money should go to clubs developing young players.
articles.title: Infantino critical of Premier League agent spending

articles.description: Judd Trump says anything other than winning the World Championship would be "a failure", but thinks Ronnie O'Sullivan is the favourite.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2024: Ronnie O'Sullivan aims for eighth Crucible title

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik Ten Hag says that Alejandro Garnacho has apologised for liking critical social media posts.
articles.title: Garnacho sorry for liking critical posts - Ten Hag

articles.description: World Athletics' decision to award prize money at the Paris Olympics "undermines the values of Olympism", a group of sport federations say.
articles.title: 2024 Olympic Games: Federations critical of World Athletics prize money

articles.description: World record holder Sebastian Steudtner rides a wave measured at 28.57m in Nazare, Portugal - an unofficial new world record awaiting confirmation.
articles.title: Surfer Sebastian Steudtner rides 28.57m wave

articles.description: Emma Hayes says she is "not thinking about fairy tales" as Chelsea prepare to face Barcelona in the Women's Champions League semi-finals.
articles.title: Hayes 'not thinking about fairytales' against Barca
